title: Real-World Problem Solving Scenarios
description: Interactive scenarios that challenge students to apply critical thinking skills to authentic problems

scenarios.title: Environmental Dilemma
scenarios.situation: Your town wants to build a new shopping center, but it would require cutting down a forest that's home to endangered species.
scenarios.challenge: You're on the town council. How do you analyze this situation and make a recommendation?
guidingQuestions: What are all the stakeholders involved?
What are the short and long-term consequences of each option?
How can you gather more information to make an informed decision?

title: Student Mindfulness Practice Workbook
description: Guided workbook for developing mindfulness and self-awareness skills in academic settings

activities.title: Breathing Awareness Exercise
activities.instructions: Spend 5 minutes focusing only on your breath. Notice when your mind wanders and gently bring attention back to breathing.
activities.reflection: How did it feel to focus on just one thing? What did you notice about your mind's tendency to wander?

title: Evidence-Based Study Strategies Guide
description: Research-backed techniques for effective learning and retention

strategies.name: Spaced Repetition
strategies.description: Review information at increasing intervals to strengthen long-term memory
strategies.implementation: Review new material after 1 day, then 3 days, then 1 week, then 1 month

strategies.name: Elaborative Interrogation
strategies.description: Ask 'why' questions about the material to deepen understanding
strategies.implementation: For each concept, ask: Why is this true? How does this connect to what I already know?
